languages.text: "Всегда считала, что шестеренки говорят несколько... непонятно. Ну, теперь, кажется, будет возможность потренироваться в расшифровке!"
"I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"
languages.original_text: "Всегда считала, что шестеренки говорят несколько... непонятно. Ну, теперь, кажется, будет возможность потренироваться в расшифровке!"

traits.locale_text: "I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"
"I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"
"I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"
"I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"

languages.text: “我几乎听不懂那个齿轮人在说些什么，但看起来，我以后会有很多机会来锻炼我的翻译能力！”
languages.original_text: "I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"

traits.locale_text: “我几乎听不懂那个齿轮人在说些什么，但看起来，我以后会有很多机会来锻炼我的翻译能力！”

languages.text: « J'avoue avoir du mal à comprendre le langage des rouages, mais c'est pas grave, puisque je vais apparemment avoir l'occasion de réviser pendant notre périple ! »
languages.original_text: "I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"

traits.locale_text: « J'avoue avoir du mal à comprendre le langage des rouages, mais c'est pas grave, puisque je vais apparemment avoir l'occasion de réviser pendant notre périple ! »

languages.text: "Ich verstehe bei Cogs kaum ein Wort. Aber offenbar bekomme ich reichlich Gelegenheit, an meinen übersetzerischen Fähigkeiten zu arbeiten!"
languages.original_text: "I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe bei Cogs kaum ein Wort. Aber offenbar bekomme ich reichlich Gelegenheit, an meinen übersetzerischen Fähigkeiten zu arbeiten!"

languages.text: 「彼らの話でどうにか役割を理解できるわ。それにしても、これから私の翻訳スキルを磨く機会はたっぷりありそうね！」
languages.original_text: "I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの話でどうにか役割を理解できるわ。それにしても、これから私の翻訳スキルを磨く機会はたっぷりありそうね！」

languages.text: «Apenas entiendo a los engranajes cuando hablan, ¡pero veo que voy a tener oportunidades de sobra de practicar mis habilidades de traductora!».
languages.original_text: "I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"

traits.locale_text: «Apenas entiendo a los engranajes cuando hablan, ¡pero veo que voy a tener oportunidades de sobra de practicar mis habilidades de traductora!».

languages.text: "Teknikçilerin dilinden çat pat anlarım. Gelgelelim tecrübe becerilerimi cilalamak için çok fırsatım olacak gibi!"
languages.original_text: "I can barely understand cogs when they talk. But it seems I'm going to have plenty of opportunities to bone up on my translation skills!"
